description: This file defines a singleton object 'ApiClient' that configures and provides a Retrofit API service for network communication with a backend server. It sets a base URL and creates an instance of 'ApiService' using Retrofit.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: A singleton object that encapsulates the Retrofit client setup and provides access to the API service.

methods.name: apiService
methods.description: Lazily initializes and returns an instance of 'ApiService' via Retrofit.
